html:
treasures/darkness/hidden riches. Cyrus will be given the spoils of war, even though they be hidden in dark places. Another possible interpretation is that God will give his true servants the hidden treasures of revelation.

call…by thy name. God's word to Cyrus was specifically directed to him. That it was a personal call is reemphasized in the next verse. So also does God call us (40:26; 43:1).
